name: Cadaver Collector

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The cadaver collector has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Summon Specters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the cadaver collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; {@dice 1d6} {@creature specter||specters} (without Sunlight Sensitivity) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the cadaver collector. The specters act right after the cadaver collector on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the cadaver collector is destroyed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cadaver collector makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The cadaver collector releases paralyzing gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a successful {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A {@condition paralyzed} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.
